select pr.id, pr.user_id, pr.record_code, pr.create_date, pr.del_flag, pr.total_price, pr.status, ui.name, ui.images, ui.id_card, ui.phone from purchase_record pr left join user_info ui on (ui.id = pr.user_id) where 1 = 1 and pr.del_flag = '0'
AND pr.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaseRecord.status},'%')
AND pr.record_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaseRecord.recordCode},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaseRecord.userName},'%')
order by pr.create_date desc
